name: Oretachi Game Center Zoku: Yie Ar Kung Fu
synopsis: Oolong has spent his entire life training for the Martial Arts Championship. The Championship has attracted masters of different disciplines, all fighting to be named champion. In Yie Ar Kung-Fu, Oolong must use his own fighting moves and face masters of the throwing shuriken, nunchaku, bo, chain, and more to fulfill his destiny. Will you fight like a tiger or run away in shame?
